casebody.data:
WILSON
v.
CARVER 254P09-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 6, 2017 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of NC. David Reed Wilson, for Wilson, David Reed.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of November 2017 *496by Petitioner for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of November 2017."
